    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static ArticleIdentity create(String identifier)
        Create an identifier for an article. The data described by the identifier is the article's XML file.

        The DOI provided must not be prefixed with "info:doi/" or any other URI scheme value.

        Parameters:
        identifier - the article's DOI
        Returns:
        an identifier for the article
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the DOI is prefixed with a URI scheme value or is null or empty

      • create

        public static ArticleIdentity create(org.ambraproject.models.Article article)
        Create an identifier for an article entity. The data described by the identifier is the article's XML file.
        Parameters:
        article - an article
        Returns:
        an identifier for the article
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the article's DOI is uninitialized or does not start with the expected scheme value

      • forXmlAsset

        public AssetFileIdentity forXmlAsset()
        Return an identifier for the asset containing this article's XML file.
        Returns:
        an identity for the XML asset

      • getArticleCode

        public String getArticleCode()
        Returns:
        the "short form" of the DOI for this article that is often used as an internal identifier. For example, if the full DOI is "10.1371/journal.pone.0077074", this method will return "pone.0077074".
